;	Cheap and dirty map file
;
;	Structures: 	Metadata:
;	# Massive		
;	H Hard			#Crystals, #Ore
;	A Normal 1		#Crystals, #Ore
;	B Normal 2		#Crystals, #Ore
;	C Normal 3		#Crystals, #Ore
;	  Ground		#Workers, 1: Visible at start (and all connected)
;	. Rubble		Amount (0-5 with 5 the most), #Ore still inside
;	= Plate			#Workers, 1: Visible at start (and all connected)
;	+ Building		Number, Orientation
;	* Building Pl.	
;	O OreF			
;	Y CrystalF		
;	- Lava			
;	~ Water			
;	@ Artifact
;
;   Keep all empty lines, this is what the loader uses as divider. 
;	(and line lengths over 1024 make us crash, try to avoid that)
;
;	TextureSet: 
img/map.png

;	Number of crystals to gather to complete the level (0 ignores it)
20

;	Number of ore to gather to complete the level (0 ignores it)
0

;	Number of artifacts to discover to complete the level (0 ignores it)
0

;	Number of buildings to own to complete level (0 ignores it)
0

;	The level introduction text: 
- ... So, just 20 crystals? Nothing more? Nothing
   special?
- Nothing special, thats all.
- All, huh? Isn't this the same cave where you already
    sent 8 men yesterday? 
- That didn't ever return back?
- Who we haven't heard literally anything about since? 
- And why is the entrance blocked, that the team 
   drill-opened yesterday?
- You just collect 20 crystals. Thats your job. 
- AND WHAT ABOUT THE TRAPPED WORKERS???

;	The level completion text:
Hehe see, we got all the 20 crystals. 
Good work! About the workers, though ...
... I mean, we saved at least *some* of them. 
Didn't we?

;
;	Main Map:
;	
######################################################
